name: tinted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of glass) with colour added: Tinted glasses (= glasses with slightly darkened lenses) are good for driving in bright sunlight. The president arrived at the airport in a car with tinted windows (= windows with darkened glass so that people cannot see into the car).
